General.Name: Cheil Worldwide
General.Description: Cheil Worldwide Inc. provides various marketing solutions worldwide. It offers strategic, creative, and media solutions; integrated digital marketing solution and social media platform; and experiential marketing solutions, such as events, exhibitions, sports, and retail marketing solutions. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
